scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.mvp:all: npm run -s mvp:preflight && npm run -s mvp:build && npm run -s mvp:smoke
scripts.ci:all: npm run -s ci:deps && npm run -s ci:preflight && npm run -s ci:build && npm run -s ci:smoke
scripts.mvp:e2e: npm run -s e2e:install && npm run -s test:e2e
scripts.test:all: npm run -s mvp:preflight && npm run -s ci:build && npm run -s test:e2e
scripts.preview:frontend: (npm --prefix web/frontend run build && npx --prefix web/frontend vite preview --port 4173 --strictPort --host 127.0.0.1)
scripts.shopify:dev: bash -lc 'ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd);  if [ -f "${ROOT}/web/frontend/package.json" ] && node -e "p=require('\''${ROOT}/web/frontend/package.json'\''); if(!(p.scripts&&p.scripts.dev))process.exit(1)" >/dev/null 2>&1; then    npm --prefix "${ROOT}/web/frontend" run dev;  elif [ -f "${ROOT}/web/package.json" ] && node -e "p=require('\''${ROOT}/web/package.json'\''); if(!(p.scripts&&p.scripts.dev))process.exit(1)" >/dev/null 2>&1; then    npm --prefix "${ROOT}/web" run dev;  else    echo "ℹ️ No usable dev script in web/frontend or web."; exit 0;  fi'
scripts.shopify:build: bash -lc 'ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd);  if [ -f "${ROOT}/web/frontend/package.json" ] && node -e "p=require('\''${ROOT}/web/frontend/package.json'\''); if(!(p.scripts&&p.scripts.build))process.exit(1)" >/dev/null 2>&1; then    npm --prefix "${ROOT}/web/frontend" run build;  elif [ -f "${ROOT}/web/package.json" ] && node -e "p=require('\''${ROOT}/web/package.json'\''); if(!(p.scripts&&p.scripts.build))process.exit(1)" >/dev/null 2>&1; then    npm --prefix "${ROOT}/web" run build;  else    echo "ℹ️ No usable build script in web/frontend or web."; exit 0;  fi'
scripts.shopify:info: bash -lc 'ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd);  if [ -f "${ROOT}/web/package.json" ] && node -e "p=require('\''${ROOT}/web/package.json'\''); if(!(p.scripts&&p.scripts.info))process.exit(1)" >/dev/null 2>&1; then    npm --prefix "${ROOT}/web" run info || echo "Shopify CLI not available.";  else    echo "ℹ️ No Shopify app 'info' script in web/."; exit 0;  fi'
